mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT Q000_LRGCTGCD AS LRGCTGCD, Q000_LRGCTGNM AS LRGCTGNM, Q000_LRGCTGSORT AS LRGCTGSORT FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q000_LRGCTGUSEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY Q000_LRGCTGSORT ASC

SELECT DISTINCT Q000_LRGCTGCD AS LRGCTGCD, Q000_MIDCTGCD AS MIDCTGCD, Q000_MIDCTGNM AS MIDCTGNM, Q000_MIDCTGSORT AS MIDCTGSORT FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q000_MIDCTGUSEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY Q000_MIDCTGSORT ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE (Q000_LRGCTGCD, Q000_LRGCTGNM, Q000_LRGCTGSORT, Q000_MIDCTGSORT, Q000_CRUSERID, Q000_CRUSERIP) VALUES ((SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(Q000_LRGCTGCD), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE), #{lrgCtgNm}, (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(Q000_LRGCTGSORT), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE), '01', #{crUserId}, #{crUserIp})

INSERT INTO HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE (Q000_LRGCTGCD, Q000_LRGCTGNM, Q000_LRGCTGSORT, Q000_MIDCTGCD, Q000_MIDCTGNM, Q000_MIDCTGSORT, Q000_CRUSERID, Q000_CRUSERIP) VALUES (#{lrgCtgCd}, #{lrgCtgNm}, #{lrgCtgSort}, (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(Q000_MIDCTGCD), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q000_LRGCTGCD = #{lrgCtgCd}), #{midCtgNm}, (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(Q000_MIDCTGSORT), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM HANGIL.TB_Q000_QUECODE WHERE Q000_LRGCTGCD = #{lrgCtgCd}), #{crUserId}, #{crUserIp})
